title: Bakersfield Unplugged
description:
Tune into live acoustics on the Prairie Fire rooftop every Thursday from 7pm - 10pm starting March 1st. Sip on drinks while you listen to your favorite local artists.

3/1: Tracy Peoples
3/8: Kaleb Taber
No Music 3/15
3/22: Bunky Spurling
3/29: Studio "O"

banner_image.alt: Bakersfield Unplugged at The Padre Hotel
